forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Areas of fog early, then partly cloudy this afternoon. High 14C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Areas of fog early, then partly cloudy this afternoon. High 57F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Low 9C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. Low 48F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds ESE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 54F. Winds ESE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Periods of light rain early. Low 9C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional light rain...mainly in the evening. Low 48F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers later in the day. High 13C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High 56F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. Low 48F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 53F. Winds ESE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 9C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 48F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low around 50F. Winds ESE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 56F. Winds SE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall may reach one inch. Locally heavy rainfall possible.

forecastday.title: Thursday

forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 56F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy after midnight. Low 49F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.
